mention.text: information wars that stand in the way of establishing a valid dialogue
information wars that prevent open dialogue
a fresh report from the Moscow Human Rights Bureau
a member of the Presidential Human Rights Council
a leading Russian NGO specializing in legal aid to victims of rights abuse and on daily monitoring of HR violations and various manifestations of xenophobia
